#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
	long long a,b,c,d,e,i,j,k,t,n,m,p,rem,qou;
	double r;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&b);
		i=1/b;
		j=1%b;
		a=b%2;
		//printf("%lld %lld\n",i,j);
		for(k=2;k<=n;++k){

			c=k/b;
			d=k%b;
			if(j==0||d==0){
				qou=0;
				rem=0;
			}
			else{
				 r= ((j*(1.0))/(b*(1.0)))*d;
				 qou=(long long)r;
				 m=b/d;
				 p=b%d;
				 rem=(j-qou*m)*d-qou*p;
			}
			//printf("%lld\n",qou);
			i= (c*i*a +c*j+i*d +qou)%2;
			j=rem;
			//printf("%lld %lld\n",i,j);
		}
		if(i%2==0)	printf("Even\n");
		else 	printf("Odd\n");

	}
	return 0;
}
